name: Diamond Blitz - Match 3 Puzzle Game For Real Money
name_original: Diamond Blitz - Match 3 Puzzle Game For Real Money
description:
Are you ready to play a fast & addictive match 3 puzzle game? Play head-to-head against players for real money & cash prizes!

Match 3 Madness!
- Score big with power-ups: line blasts, magic crystals, & bombs!
- Quick! 90 Seconds to beat your opponent!
- Challenge people from around the world!

Climb the leaderboard, win cash, and earn many prizes! Test your match 3 puzzle game skills today!
